data.name: The Undead
data.detailed_description: The Undead is a first-person shooter that takes place in a cemetery. You must fight waves of zombies and skeletons. You start off with 500 dollars. Every kill adds to your money. You use that money to open a door , buy ammo and buy guns. The ammo is located where the beams of light are. You have to open up the cement coffin and jump inside to buy your ammo.  When you reach 30 kills you'll be confronted against a fearsome foe. See how long you can survive for.
data.about_the_game: The Undead is a first-person shooter that takes place in a cemetery. You must fight waves of zombies and skeletons. You start off with 500 dollars. Every kill adds to your money. You use that money to open a door , buy ammo and buy guns. The ammo is located where the beams of light are. You have to open up the cement coffin and jump inside to buy your ammo.  When you reach 30 kills you'll be confronted against a fearsome foe. See how long you can survive for.
data.short_description: The Undead is a first-person shooter that takes place in a cemetery. You must fight waves of zombies and skeletons. When you reach 30 kills you'll be confronted against a fearsome foe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.60 GHz Intel Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: There is blood splatters when you shoot the zombies. There is also a large blood splatter when you kill the zombies.
